name: About Me
body:
```javascript
/**
 * Created by my parents.
 * Created date: 15th March 1988
 * Last updated: 26th June 2014
 */
var me = {
    name: 'Joe Wu' || '吴建南',
    nickName:'_Me',
    gender: 'male',
    married: false,
    address: 'Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China',
    website: ['www.wujn.me','168miles.com'],
    interests: ['coding', 'films', 'animation', 'basketball']
};
```

***

```SQL
--Work Experience
CREATE TABLE [WorkExprience]
    (
      [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1, 1)
                 PRIMARY KEY ,
      [Company] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL ,
      [Location] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL ,
      [BeginDate] [datetime] NOT NULL ,
      [EndDate] [datetime] NOT NULL ,
      [JobTitle] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL ,
      [Description] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL
    )
GO
--Insert Values
--#1
INSERT  INTO [WorkExprience]
        ( [Company] ,
          [Location] ,
          [BeginDate] ,
          [EndDate] ,
          [JobTitle] ,
          [Description]
        )
VALUES  ( 'Kunming SunWise Software Company' ,
          'Kunming,Yunnan' ,
          '2010/01/01' ,
          '2010/08/01' ,
          'Assistant Software Engineer' ,
          'As a intern, I learned lots of experience in developing industry software.
         Primaryly worked on Asp.net and SQL Server'
        )
--#2

          [Location] ,
```
